text: Francisco Cepeda (March 8, 1906 – July 14, 1935) was a Spanish cyclist. He died while being transported to a hospital after a fall in the Tour de France on the descent of the Col du Galibier. ==Major results== ;1925 :1st Circuito de Getxo ;1926 :2nd Prueba Villafranca de Ordizia :2nd Circuito de Getxo ;1927 :3rd Spanish National Road Race Championships ;1929 :1st Circuito de Getxo :1st GP Pascuas :1st Vuelta a Alava :2nd GP Vizcaya ;1931 :2nd Prueba Villafranca de Ordizia :3rd GP Vizcaya ;1932 :3rd Vuelta a Alava ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1935 deaths Category:Cyclists killed while racing Category:People from Enkarterri Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Sport deaths in France Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Francisco Cepeda (cyclist)
